pr_title: Prevent team griefing on scored matches

timeline.message:
Prevent team griefing on scored matches

Signed-off-by: Pablete1234 <pabloherrerapalacio@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: You caused too much negative impact to play this match
timeline.author: Electroid
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -35,6 +35,8 @@ join.err.noPermission = You are not allowed to join this match
 
 join.err.alreadyJoined = You have already joined the match
 
+join.err.teamGrief = You made a negative impact for your team and can no longer play this match

timeline.message:
Modify team grief error message
